meaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>scooter</radical> when the <radical>omen</radical> comes so that you can <kanji>escape</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You decide to <kanji>escape</kanji> this omen by weaving in and out of the busy streets of <reading>とう</reading>きょう. By now, you know とうきょう like the back of your hand, so you're sure you can escape this way.
